line_1: And when I boast my feats, the shrew
line_2: Asks who was slain the last review.

line_1: And shun, above all Things, a housewifely Shrew;
line_2: Be sure, wed a Woman you thoroughly know,

line_1: Each evening meet; the sot, the cheat, the shrew:
line_2: Here, in cabal, a disputatious crew

line_1: The thoughtful Sage oft weds a Shrew;
line_2: And Vestals languish for a Beau:

line_1: My second's the test of a shrew,
line_2: It will crouch to the sole of your shoe.
